React.useMemo( () => [ { Header: , accessor: 'date', // accessor is the "key" in the data }, { Header: 'PING', accessor: 'ping', }, { Header: , accessor: 'download', }, { Header: , accessor: 'upload', }, { Header: , accessor: 'km', }, { Header: , accessor: 'location', }, { Header: , accessor: 'iss', }, { Header: '', accessor: 'action', } ], [] ); const tableInstance = useTable({ columns, data }) const { getTableProps, getTableBodyProps, headerGroups, prepareRow, page, // Instead of using 'rows', we'll use page, // which has only the rows for the active page // The rest of these things are super handy, too ;) canPreviousPage, canNextPage, pageOptions, pageCount, gotoPage, nextPage, previousPage, setPageSize, state: { pageIndex, pageSize }, } = useTable( { columns, data, initialState: { pageIndex: 0, pageSize: 5 }, }, usePagination ) return (
{headerGroups.map(headerGroup => ( {headerGroup.headers.map(column => ( ))} ))} {page.map(row => { prepareRow(row) return ( {row.cells.map(cell => { if(cell.column.id == 'date') { return ( ) } else if(cell.column.id == 'location') { return ( ) } else if(cell.column.id == 'iss') { return ( ) } else if(cell.column.id == 'action') { return ( ) } else { return ( ) } })} ) })}
